mapper.select: SELECT mo.mo_material_id, mo.mo_order_id, mo.mo_name, mc.mc_company_name as mo_com_nm, mo.mo_num FROM material_order mo JOIN material_company mc ON mc.mc_company_id = mo.mo_company_id WHERE mo_progress_code = 'L0102'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO material_io(mio_no, mio_company_id, mio_company_name, mio_mo_order_id, mio_quantity, mio_progress, mio_quality, mio_date) SELECT mo_material_id, mo_company_id, #{moComNm}, mo_order_id, #{mioQntt}, 'L0103', #{mioQuality} as mioQuality, sysdate as mioDate FROM material_order WHERE mo_material_id = #{moMaterialId} and mo_order_id = #{moOrderId} GROUP BY mo_material_id,mo_company_id, mo_order_id
